snippet: An unlikely experiment is underway in the Central African Republic as a council of 135 rebels, rivals, politicians and others is trying to choose an interim president.
abstract: Council of 135 rebels, rivals, politicians and others in the Central African Republic is hoping to choose a new president for the fractured country; it is unclear whether an agreement on an interim president will be enough to persuade warring parties to drop their arms.
lead_paragraph: An unlikely experiment is underway in the Central African Republic as a council of 135 rebels, rivals, politicians and others is trying to choose an interim president.

headline.main: Last-Ditch Effort Emerges to Restore Order in Central African Republic
headline.print_headline: Last-Ditch Effort Emerges to Restore Order in Central African Republic

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
